Description: Body sherd (mended from five fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black (partly worn); at bottom of omphalos dot and billet band in added red and white, above band of broken maeanders between bands, all in white; on floor band of alternating red and white tongues; exterior reserved with band of dots between pairs of dilute lines; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1985) (phase 2)
